description:
This mod is a custom gamemode that allows for playing team-based sub-gamemodes Gamemodes include: team deathmatch, free-for-all, hostage rescue, capture the flag, search and destroy, etc. This mod alseo allows for a map vote and gamemode vote. There is also a basic map editor that allows for creating and saving maps. Within this editor, there are special blocks to place around your map to model specific objectives or special locations to make the maps function with all desired gamemode(s) 

more info at
https://www.youtube.com/@ParadigmBlock/videos
name: Paradigm Block PvP Arena
